label.name: Europeana type
label.description: lido:classification lido:type="europeana:type" lido:term lido:addedSearchTerm="no" (to be mapped to eu:type)

label.name: Resource language
label.description: lido:classification lido:type="europeana:language" (language of the resource is mandatory when "europeana:type"=TEXT)

label.name: Identifier type
label.description: Contains the workID type for lido:workID lido:type="xx"

label.name: Identifier number
label.description: lido:workID lido:pref="Alternative" lido:type="xx" (lido:type comes from value in "workIDType")

label.name: Description type
label.description: Contains the description type for lido:descriptiveNoteValue lido:type="xx"

label.name: Description type
label.description: Contains the description type for lido:descriptiveNoteValue lido:type="xx"

label.name: Description
label.description: lido:objectDescriptionSet lido:descriptiveNoteValue lido:type="xx" (lido:type comes from value in "descriptionType")

label.name: Description
label.description: lido:objectDescriptionSet lido:descriptiveNoteValue lido:type="xx" (lido:type comes from value in "descriptionType")

label.name: Measurements remark
label.description: No separate LIDO element. Can go with other measurement values into lido:displayObjectMeasurements

label.name: Measurement remark
label.description: No separate LIDO element. Can go with other measurement values into lido:displayObjectMeasurements

label.name: State edition information
label.description: lido:displayStateEdition (to be used for prints and multiples)

label.name: State type
label.description: Contains the state type for lido:stateEdition lido:type="xx" (to be used for prints and multiples)

label.name: State
label.description: lido:displayState lido:type="xx" (lido:type comes from value in "displayStateType", to be used for prints and multiples)

label.name: Type of event
label.description: Contains the type of subjectEvent - lido:subjectEvent lido:type="xxx"

label.name: Descriptive metadata language
label.description: Contains the language label for lido:descriptiveMetadata @xml:lang="xx"

label.name: Administrative metadata language
label.description: Contains the language label for lido:administrativeMetadata @xml:lang="xx"

label.name: Type
label.description: Contains the attribute type for lido:objectPublsihedID lido:type="xx"

label.name: Published ID
label.description: lido:objectPublishedID lido:type="xx" (type to be taken from objectPublishedIDType)

label.name: Type
label.description: Contains the attribute type for lido:lidoRecID lido:type="xx"

label.name: Metadata Record ID
label.description: lido:lidoRecID lido:type="xx" (type to be taken from recIDType)

label.name: Display source name
label.description: lido:recordSource type="europeana:dataProvider" - for Europeana "View item at"

label.name: Resource rights type
label.description: lido:rightsResource lido:rightsType pref="alternative" ; contains own rights statement

label.name: Resource rights type (Europeana)
label.description: lido:rightsResource lido:rightsType pref="preferred" type="URL"; should contain value from Europeana Rights Guidelines (http://pro.europeana.eu/documents/900548/0d423921-23e0-45fa-82a4-2ac72b3e6f38)

label.name: Resource publication setting
label.description: lido:resourceRepresentation - if value is Yes, preferred THEN lido:pref="preferred" ; if value is Yes, alternative THEN lido:pref="alternative" ; when value is no, then resource not for publication
